item.description:
This is the event that was re-scheduled from late December!

Please join us for a special potluck and meetup on the topic of alternative and natural building options that are healthy and affordable. Our permaculture friend Noah Wentworth of Evergreen Building Collaborative (and potentially some other contributors) will be taking us on a slideshow/tour of different techniques and, based on what we learn, we can organize some hands-on sessions for Spring or see who wants to help each other on personal projects....

This meetup is based on the idea submitted by Max J so we hope to cover things like strawbale, cob, cordwood, tipis, yurts, yomes, domes, etc. as well as start a discussion of how we work together on some of these. If anyone has had any experience with any of these methods, feel free to contact LisaF to be a part of this panel.  We'd love to hear from our members!

6:30 Potluck (bring potluck kit and dish/beverage to share)

 7:00 Announcements + Presentation + Discussion 

8:30 Wrap-up, etc.


Please remember to bring a dish to share and your potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin) as we will be trying to avoid disposable goods. 

-----

PS: if any members would like to shoot some video or write about this event....pls contact LisaF!
item.how_to_find_us: Use the back door of the building to enter the function hall. Some parking spots available from Danforth Street otherwise street parking is fine.
item.why: It is the re-scheduled version of this event that we postponed from last December!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Intro to Alternative/Natural Shelter Construction
